uptidy

Dashboard Landing page
about the project

With Uptidy we hope to deliver an all encompassing cleaning service that delivers all the information needed for both cleaners and costumers to interact in a digestible fashion. Encouraging the use of the platform through simplicity and ease of use is the goal.

Industry: Cleaning

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Designer, Front-end development, QA, DevOps

How it works
I want to see screens for:
Cleaner Customer

Select the type of user you are and create an account

Mobile version

Being able to keep track of your orders while on the move is key for both types of users. So we made sure to optimize our service for mobile use.

Logo

A logo is always a way to stand out and present the business, that’s why Uptidy’s design is both clean and inviting. Our approach echoes throughout the whole service.

Landing Page

Uptidy’s landing focuses on providing a fast quote with simple but detailed tools. In seconds the customer will know what to expect. We tackle the most common orders right up front and then let the user play with the parameters as soon as we catch their interest.

Typography & colors

Poppins

Aa Bb Cc Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj Kk Ll Mm Nn Oo Pp Qq Rr Ss Tt Uu Vv Ww Xx Yy Zz

Purity Main crystal White Dark crystal celestial
Result

Both cleaners and customers experience a swift, easy and effective cleaning service. Everything they need will be clearly visualized and communicated. An experience that will keep them subscribed.
